name: Jan SILVERMAN, Petitioner v. Honorable Judge Willis BERRY, Jr., Judge of Philadelphia County, Respondent

parties: Jan SILVERMAN, Petitioner v. Honorable Judge Willis BERRY, Jr., Judge of Philadelphia County, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 30th day of August, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED. The Prothonotary is directed to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
52 A.3d 219
Jan SILVERMAN, Petitioner v. Honorable Judge Willis BERRY, Jr., Judge of Philadelphia County, Respondent.
No. 101 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 30, 2012.
